text: Puya may refer to: * Puya (plant), in the family Bromeliaceae * Puya (river), in Russia * Puya, a variety of Guajillo chili * Puya (Meitei texts), traditional or mythological texts of the Meetei people * Culoepuya or Culo'e Puya, Venezuelan drums of Congolese origin * Puya (band), a progressive metal band from Puerto Rico ** Puya (album), a 1995 album by the band * Puya, a Romanian rapper from the hip-hop, rap group La Familia
title: Puya
